title: La Botanica
typeOfFood: Vegan, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Spanish, TexMex
description: A 100% vegan restaurant and full bar. In addition to their regular menu, offers seasonal menu items. Creative dishes in the regular menu include ceviche huehuescoyotl, black bean empanadas, fried red beans and rice balls, and sugarbomb's strawberry calas for dessert. Drinks include pepino blanco, mi carino, and mezcalarita. Sunday brunch. Indoor and outdoor seating with a lively atmosphere at night. Also has film screenings, live music, regular installations by local artists, cooking and gardening classes, and holds benefits to raise funds for movements that advance social justice.
